meta.label: Image conversion
meta.description: Convert PDF/JPG/JPEG/PNG/TIFF files into greyscale JPG images. Split multipage PDF into multiple images as well.

inputRoles.name: input_folder
inputRoles.label: Input folder
inputRoles.description: Folder of input images or PDF

params.name: dpi
params.label: Dot Per Inch (DPI)
params.description: DPI of output images (only for images converted from PDF).

params.name: quality
params.label: Quality
params.description: Quality of output images, on a scale from 1 (worst) to 95 (best). The default is 75. More info here: https://pillow.readthedocs.io/en/5.1.x/handbook/image-file-formats.html#jpeg
